products.title: Radiant FR Burgundy
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure radiant fr burgundy perfect fit roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 350mm max width: 1400mm
 	min drop: 150mm max drop: 2000mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
